definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: She had a cultivated mind, and was, generally speaking, rational and consistent;
sentences.chinese: 她心性嫺雅，一般說來也很明智，堅定。

sentences.english: Propofol is normally administered only in hospital settings.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，只有醫院纔有權開異丙酚。

sentences.english: You basically have three sources of input and output.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，主要存在三個輸入和輸出源。

sentences.english: The continental crust has an average composition similar to that of the igneous rock, andesite.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來大陸地殼的組成成分是火成岩和安山岩。

sentences.english: As a general principle, 3% of turnover.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，應花營業額的3%。

sentences.english: Normally, transplanted trees are not flourishing if the seedlings be transplanted incorrectly.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，茶苗移栽的技術掌握不當。

sentences.english: The high pressure pump is generally one of the most dependable and best constructed components in a high pressure cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，高壓水泵是高壓清洗機裏最可靠的部件。

sentences.english: Generally, mortality was low except in young piglets.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，除小豬仔外，死亡率低下。

sentences.english: The amount of sugar added generally increases as one heads south.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，越是靠南，所加的糖就越多。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, a thesis to have relatively fixed format.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，一篇畢業論文要具備相對固定的格式。

sentences.english: "Generally, we do incremental changes, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “一般說來，我們做增量變化”他說。

sentences.english: As a rule these materials do not show hysteresis .
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，這些材料不顯示磁滯現象。

sentences.english: In a general way that's missing his tip , " Mr. Childers answered."
sentences.chinese: “一般說來，這就是出岔子，”齊兒德斯先生回答說。

sentences.english: The students all respected their teachers, in general.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，所有的學生都尊敬老師。

sentences.english: Generally,you shouldn't overeat yourself before sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來睡覺之前你不能喫得過飽。

sentences.english: Socks are commonly worn by people, by men and women, old and young.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，男女老幼各種人都要穿短襪。
